CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, May 23, 1959, page A15, reads: "National BPW Officers - Among the prominent guests who attended the fabulous Founders Day breakfast, sponsored by the Pittsburgh Club of Negro Business and Professional Women, were, left to right: Mrs. Marion Sappington Bryant, host president and national recording secretary; Mrs. Wilnette B. Price, national corresponding secretary; Mrs. Florence Allen Holmes, president of the New York Club and first vice president of the national organization, and Mrs. Blanche Russell Crayton of Cleveland, Ohio, national public relations director. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait of four women from the Pittsburgh Club of Negro Business and Professional Women, including, from left to right, Marion Sappington Bryant, Wilnette B. Price, Florence Allen Holmes, and Blanche Russell Crayton, Pittsburgh Club of the Negro Business and Professional Women, gathered for the Founders Day Breakfast in the Pittsburgh Room at the Penn Sheraton Hotel
